The impressive Edwardian-era mansion offers the perfect balance of old-world charm and modern comforts with period-style interiors, a state-of-the-art day spa, a large heated swimming pool, and three exquisite dining outlets with outdoor terraces overlooking the grounds. Plus, you can perfect your putt on one of the two championship-standard 18-hole golf courses.
